short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fontcetera is a browser extension that allows you to use custom fonts on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your plain text into stylish Unicode fonts with 𝐅𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐜𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐚!

This easy-to-use extension allows you to format your text with various Unicode fonts and styles, perfect for social media posts, messaging, or any platform that supports Unicode characters.

𝑲𝒆𝒚 𝑭𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒔:
• Multiple font options: 𝙼𝚘𝚗𝚘𝚜𝚙𝚊𝚌𝚎, 𝔊𝔬𝔱𝔥𝔦𝔠, 𝒮𝒸𝓇𝒾𝓅𝓉...
• Text styling: Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, and Overline (availability depends on the selected font)
• Real-time preview of formatted text
• One-click copy to clipboard
• User-friendly interface

𝑯𝒐𝒘 𝒕𝒐 𝒖𝒔𝒆:

𝟷. 𝙴𝚗𝚝𝚎𝚛 𝚢𝚘𝚞𝚛 𝚝𝚎𝚡𝚝 𝚒𝚗 𝚝𝚑𝚎 𝚒𝚗𝚙𝚞𝚝 𝚏𝚒𝚎𝚕𝚍
𝟸. 𝚂𝚎𝚕𝚎𝚌𝚝 𝚢𝚘𝚞𝚛 𝚍𝚎𝚜𝚒𝚛𝚎𝚍 𝚏𝚘𝚗𝚝 𝚊𝚗𝚍 𝚊𝚙𝚙𝚕𝚢 𝚜𝚝𝚢𝚕𝚎𝚜
𝟹. 𝙲𝚘𝚙𝚢 𝚝𝚑𝚎 𝚏𝚘𝚛𝚖𝚊𝚝𝚝𝚎𝚍 𝚝𝚎𝚡𝚝 𝚊𝚗𝚍 𝚞𝚜𝚎 𝚒𝚝 𝚊𝚗𝚢𝚠𝚑𝚎𝚛𝚎 𝚄𝚗𝚒𝚌𝚘𝚍𝚎 𝚒𝚜 𝚜𝚞𝚙𝚙𝚘𝚛𝚝𝚎𝚍
